name: Tax Evaders (casuallobster)
description:
Evade taxes for as long as possible while CRA agents chase you down!

Embezzle funds from your company during the day, the more you embezzle, the more "heat" you will attract!

During the night, alter evidence to lower your "heat" again while government agents hunt you down! Avoid them, place traps, and hide in plants and tables in order to reach the end of the night!

WASD - Move

E - Interact with Printers and Hide

T - Open trap menu

Left click - place traps ($500)

1. Day:

Pick how much money you are embezzling. The more money you embezzle, the more heat you get! (Click on the bar)

2. Night:

Press E on  printers to reduce heat! Only *one* random spawn per night.

Avoid government agents until the end of the night!

The more heat you have the more agents spawn!

Press E near an  eye icon to hide!

Press T to open up trap menu, then left click to spend 500$ to place traps!

Made for Ludum Dare 50
